title: FT: 1929-30 Rogers Peet partial set of 13 for Cobb, Wagner, Mathewson or Young
author: famousgolfers

posts.post_title: FT: 1929-30 Rogers Peet partial set of 13 for Cobb, Wagner, Mathewson or Young
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I currently have the following 1929-30 Rogers Peet cards for sale/trade.  I was wondering if anyone had a Ty Cobb, Honus Wagner, Christy Mathewson or Cy Young card that they would be interested in trading for some or all of this lot.  I am flexible with cash on either side of the transaction to make it work.  Please send me an email, if you are interested in discussing any possible trades.

1929-30 Rogers Peet cards:
#06 - Sabin Carr GAI 8 (Track)
#10 - Lionel Conacher GAI 7.5 with Wrapper (Hockey)
#11 - Gene Tunney GAI 7.5 with Wrapper (Boxing)
#12 - Col. Chas. A. Lindbergh GAI 9 with Wrapper (Aviation)
#18 - Herb Pennock GAI 7 (Baseball)
#22 - Frank Boucher GAI 8.5 (Hockey)
#23 - Com. Richard E. Byrd GAI 8 (Aviation)
#30 - Peter De Paolo GAI 9 (Auto Racing)
#35 - William Tilden GAI 7 (Tennis)
#36 - Jack Dempsey GAI 7.5 (Boxing)
#42 - Bill Burch GAI 7.5 (Hockey)
#46 - Bill Melhorn SGC 7.5 (Golf)
#47 - Max Schmelling GAI 4.5 (Boxing)

The entire lot is listed on eBay, if you would like to see pictures:

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=220666245643&ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT[/url]

Thank you,
Jason
